frameDefinitions: Through a  Message, a Speaker (sometimes encoded metonymically by a Medium) communicates the relative importance of the state of affairs denoted by the Message.
In this frame a Part is part of a larger Whole comprised of parts that are ordered.
An entity is integrated into a building as a Part of a (possibly unexpressed)
The Fastener is an artifact created to close a Container (e.g. coat, jar).
An entity is integrated into a vehicle as a Part of a (possibly unexpressed)
LUs in this frame denote a period of time in which an Enabled_action becomes possible.
frameExamples: Reid <t>emphasized</t> that he and Dean meet every month.
I sat through the first interminable <t><fex name='Part'>act</fex></t>  of the play  .
It was of great interest to me to see the star signs of Taurus the Bull and Leo the Lion on the <t><fex name='Part'>staircase</fex></t> to the upper Palace.
The door <t>seal</t> prevented air from getting in and the kids' screams from getting out.
The car's <t>engine</t> started smoking so we pulled over.
Allow a three-day <t>window</t> for delivery.  DNI
listRoleDefinitions: The person who uses language in the written or spoken modality to convey a <fen>Message</fen> to another person.
The proposition whose denotation the Speaker presents as important.
The physical or abstract setting in which the <fen>Message</fen> is conveyed.
The time at which the <fen>Speaker</fen> communicates a <fen>Message</fen>.
The location where the <fen>Speaker</fen> delivers the <fen>Message</fen>.
This is the number of the sequence of <fen>Part</fen>s.
An undivided entity having all its <fen>Part</fen>s.
A  <fen>Part</fen> of a larger architectural unit, the  <fen>Whole</fen>.
This role identifies the item that is closed with the <fen>Fastener</fen>.
The artifact created to close a <fen>Container</fen>.
This role identifies the active zone of the container where the <fen>Fastener</fen> is located.
Some <fex name='Part'>Part</fex> of the larger vehicle, the <fex name='Whole'>Whole</fex>.
A vehicle (the <fex name='Whole'>Whole</fex>)  which includes the <fex name='Part'>Part</fex>.
The action that becomes possible through the existence of the period of time.
A quantity or other characterization of the period of the time in which an <fen>Enabled_action</fen> is allowed.  In this frame, the duration may be exact or inexact.
The <fen>Agent</fen> is the one who performs the <fen>Enabled_action</fen>.
listRoleExamples: <fex>Juhl</fex> emphasized the importance of UPMC System investments, stating that their contribution to the school's funds had tripled in recent years.
He emphasized to me <fex>that my words will go down in history and that this poem has made a difference in our world</fex>.
<fex>The report</fex> emphasized that Iraq's unwillingness to cooperate represents a serious problem for the progress of this work.
However, Cockerill stressed <fex>last week</fex> that he had had many meetings about these obvious synergies and that he had pursued these aggressively.
Putin stressed <fex>in Beijing</fex> that Russia does not favor independence for Taiwan.
I sat through the <fex>first</fex> interminable <fex>act</fex> of the play .
I sat through the first interminable <fex>act</fex> of the play .
I sat through the first interminable <fex>act</fex> <fex>of the play</fex> .
Could you open the <fex>door</fex> for me, please?
On Friday night, many men will simply elect to remove their tie and unbutton their top <fex>shirt</fex> button.
Man, I have just bought the exact same belt <fex><t>buckle</t></fex> and it won't open.
We couldn't close the <fex>tent flap</fex> zipper and a lot of flies came in .
